channel.title: Uhm i need some help with a case
channel.description:
im tryign to make it so that you open a casket and get a random pirate item, i have made the random thing in item.java but im having a problem in client.java with this:
[code]client.java:24661: int cannot be dereferenced addItem(Item.randomPirate(), 1); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Uhm i need some help with a case
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

sonjichan:

Post the code from the item.java referencing to that string.

eh?

this is whats in the item.java:

[code]public static int Pirate[] = {2651,2651,2997,7138,7138,7138,7136,7136,7136,7134,7134,7134,7132,7132,7132,7130,7130,7130,7128,7128,7128,7126,7126,7126,7124,7124,7124,7122,7122,7122,7116,7116,7116,7112,7112,7112,7110,7110,7110,2651,2651,2997,7138,7138,7138,7136,7136,7136,7134,7134,7134,7132,7132,7132,7130,7130,7130,7128,7128,7128,7126,7126,7126,7124,7124,7124,7122,7122,7122,7116,7116,7116,7112,7112,7112,7110,7110,7110,7114,};

public static int randomPirate()
{
	return Pirate[(int)(Math.random()*Pirate.length)];
}[/code]

this is what is in client.java:

case 405:// pirate casket deleteItem(405, GetItemSlot(405), 1); sendMessage("you open the casket, and find some cool looking pirate clothes"); addItem(Item.randomPirate(), 1); break;

i normally am able to fix it when i get the error but i forgot how :S

Read full topic
